Index.title: Welcome to MitreMesh
Index.description: Where MITRE's framework meets dynamic scenario generation, creating a comprehensive net of incident response tests for cybersecurity professionals.
Index.p1: Dive into the intricacies of the MITRE ATT&CK framework, your key to decoding the strategies, techniques, and procedures (TTPs) utilized by cyber adversaries. Often, putting this knowledge into tangible testing scenarios can be a challenge.
Index.p2: That's where AttackGen steps in. We harness the power of large language models to swiftly create realistic attack scenarios tailored to specific threat actor techniques.
Index.subtitle: Kickstart Your Experience
Index.l1: Plug in your OpenAI API key.
Index.l2: Head over to the Scenario page. Then pick your company's industry and size. Choose a threat actor group and watch as a scenario comes to life.

Scenario.title: Generate Scenario
Scenario.description: Pick your company's industry and size, and choose a threat actor group.
